highlights.description: Traditional Cabinetry produces some of the most high-quality cabinetry in Central, MN. They are a small company that is beginning to take on new ventures and improve its core business. I started working in the shop but moved into the office to help with scheduling and shop efficiency. Overall, the people here are fantastic and the quality of their work should be known nationwide.

Identified, led, road mapped, and implemented 14 new initiatives to help our team reduce the feeling of chaos in the product delivery pipeline, to improve the efficiency of operations, and to promote a higher level of business acumen among owners.

Created, implemented, and managed a project management system that functioned to communicate project timelines, proactively identity project bottle necks, prioritize tasks, and deliver projects within their scheduled amount of time
Analyzed marketplace price points and company costs to create a pricing strategy and bid documents that helped increase the owner's confidence in project estimates.
Promoted a culture of proactivity, open communication, documentation, and consistent communication across teams.
Removed data entry labor and decreased errors caused by manual data entry by gathering requirements, creating, and maintaining an excel macro programming with visual basic.

SiteFlight is a small web design company that focuses on building websites for small and medium sized businesses. Their design process incorporates Discover, Design, Build, and Launch to help create websites that express the personality behind the company.
Worked with important external project stakeholders to propose ideas, define requirements, and achieve success on 11 WordPress websites that drive over 28,000 monthly search impressions.
Conducted quantitative and qualitative user research that led to data-driven decisions that helped produce requirements, goals, scope, and budget for client website projects.
Designed and programmed various plugins with PHP, JavaScript, and CSS that utilized WordPress' API to achieve custom functionality on client websites.
Formulated and executed a design process that included conducting market research, building prototypes with Figma, building the website, and utilizing version control on GitHub.
Evaluated competitor pricing and internal process to create a competitive pricing strategy.

Yellowstone Pavement Solutions operates out of two of the most well-known areas in Montana. They are a well-managed company that performs pavement maintenance tasks in the most well-respected places in the nation, including Yellowstone National Park, the National Institute of Health, and Airforce Bases across Montana.
Worked with my business partner to evaluate competitor prices and create an introductory pricing structure that helped to grow the businesses from 150K revenue in year one to over 550k in year two
Made data-driven strategic decisions for various functions including equipment purchasing, growth planning, marketing strategy, operations, and sales strategy.
Earned a strong, 5 star, reputation with commercial, state government, federal government, and residential clients by building solid rapport and exceeding stakeholder expectations.
Increased the daily production capacity of residential crews from $4,000/day to $10,000/day by evaluating and improving the processes used to complete projects in an efficient manner.
Led employee management practices that helped to clearly define employee expectations and create a clear path for progression.

Real Avid creates very user-conscious tools for the outdoorsman. They obsessed over the user's experience of their products and have transformed several markets within their industry due to their obsession. They experienced substantial growth in the years during and following my departure. To this day, I still have the "Good Luck" poster that, upon my resignation, the chief engineer made for me hanging in my room.
Analyzed market trends and consumer data to make data-driven recommendations for 8 new products that have cumulatively acquired over 7,000 reviews on Amazon.

Took ownership over the company's presence on Amazon by implementing a KPI tracking dashboard, A/B testing content, proactively managing catalog emergencies, launching an Amazon Brand Store, creating A+ content, and participating in Amazon experiments
Conducted market research to determine the best way to communicate the value of products across our entire ecommerce presence, including Amazon, Cabelas, and WalMart

projects.description: SiteFlight is a website design and build a company that I own (consider it freelance work). It started as a drone photography business that shifted into a website design business by identifying and responding to customer needs and internal skills. SiteFlight is still running as a side project to help me build website design and marketing skills.
